resources.string: Add healthy calories. You don\'t need to drastically change your diet. Opt for foods rich in nutrients. Instead of eating empty calories and junk food, eat foods that are rich in nutrients.

Regular physical activity burns calories and builds muscle tissue. Reduce time before the screen. People who spend a lot of time in front of screens are more likely to be overweight. Be careful with distorted portions, eat 5 servings of fruits and vegetables per day. Don\'t skip breakfast.
Limit the consumption of foods that are rich in sugars and fats, Eat fruits and vegetables several times a day, as well as legumes, whole grains and nuts. Do frequent physical activity, Quit smoking
